reviewtext: I purchased two of these for the Jeff Dunham show and they worked well.  We could see clearly from the balcony and you could hold them up without tiring, as they are very light. They lost a star because the design causes eyelash flair; the eyepieces could use a redesign.  Pity they could not help the sound - the acoustics at the Long Beach PAC are the worst I have been to in many years, and I go out a lot.
